title: Ticket #4374: Improve default configuration for v8.2.0
description:
The default config for v8.2.0 needs some additional work. Looking over what we have now, ToddT and GregT came up with the following list:

  1. CLAIM_WORKLIFE of an hour seems a bit long esp with preemption disabled by default; seems like 20 minutes seems better in absence of preemption.
  2. Wouldn't it be better to disable preemption via MaxJobRetirementTime instead of changing PREEMPTION_REQUIREMENTS ? This way, the no preemption policy is honored even in the face of draining, for instance. Also it would be easier for an admin to re-enable preemption by simply adjusting the MaxJobRetirementTime to whatever they want instead of messing around with a potentially complicated expression.
  3. condor_config.annotated should be released, i.e. the CMakefile should be modified to copy it into the release examples directory. Right now it looks like the only place condor_config.annotated can be found is in the source code.
  4. should metaknob policy always_run be enabled by default, just like the host security metaknob is? BTW, if this metaknob, MaxJobRetirementTime is 0 - what does that mean?
  5. should preemption_rank go by inverse wall clock time by default?
  6. the "uwcs" preemption_requirements expression looks to be broken. guessing it evaluates to undefined most of the time due to bug #4369
  7. we should have negotiator_pre_job_rank do some local best fit with respect to cpu and memory.
